717030100. Berg converted to protestantism

Province of Berg — Not random

Triggered by

Action D of 717030101 - AI_EVENT for Muslim Nations
Action B, C, D of 717030103 - AI_EVENT for Muslim Nations
Action C, D of 717030102 - AI_EVENT for Muslim Nations

Description

As a result of the spread of the reformation, the province is now considered as being of the evangelic-lutheran faith.

Actions

A. OK

  • Religion in Berg changes to protestant
